text: This is a list of members of the 16th Bundestag – the lower house of parliament of the Federal Republic of Germany, whose members were in office from 18 October 2005 until 27 October 2009. __TOC__ == Summary == This summary includes changes in the numbers of the five caucuses (CDU/CSU, SPD, FDP, The Left, Greens): {| class=wikitable |- valign=bottom ! Time ! Reason of change ! CDU/CSU ! SPD ! FDP ! Left ! Greens ! Others !
